variations.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to 120% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Poison for 5s. Can stack up to 10 times. Poison: Deals Magic DMG equal to 20% + (10% * poison stacks) of Ushpia's ATK every second.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 140% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Poison for 5s. Can stack up to 10 times. Poison: Deals Magic DMG equal to 20% + (10% * poison stacks) of Ushpia's ATK every second.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 160% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Poison for 5s. Can stack up to 10 times. Poison: Deals Magic DMG equal to 20% + (10% * poison stacks) of Ushpia's ATK every second.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 180% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Poison for 5s. Can stack up to 10 times. Poison: Deals Magic DMG equal to 20% + (10% * poison stacks) of Ushpia's ATK every second.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 200% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Poison for 5s. Can stack up to 10 times. Poison: Deals Magic DMG equal to 20% + (10% * poison stacks) of Ushpia's ATK every second.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 180% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Poison to them. Each stack deals extra Magic DMG equal to 30% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 210% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Poison to them. Each stack deals extra Magic DMG equal to 35% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 240% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Poison to them. Each stack deals extra Magic DMG equal to 40% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Poison to them. Each stack deals extra Magic DMG equal to 45% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 300% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Poison to them. Each stack deals extra Magic DMG equal to 50% of ATK.
Venom Eruption stuns the enemy for 0.5 seconds.
Venom Eruption stuns the enemy for 1 second.
